tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE software_upgrades (
    device_id UUID,
    upgrade_version INT,
    upgrade_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE smart_home_devices (
id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
device_id UUID UNIQUE,
device_name VARCHAR(100),
firmware_version INTEGER,
last_upgrade_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE upgrade_logs (
log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
device_id UUID,
upgrade_date TIMESTAMP,
upgrade_version INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE upgrade_jobs (
job_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
device_id UUID,
job_status VARCHAR(50),
scheduled_time TIMESTAMP,
completed_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE upgrade_errors (
error_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
device_id UUID,
error_message TEXT,
error_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE device_updates (
  update_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID,
  update_type TEXT,
  update_status TEXT,
  update_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_devices (
  user_id UUID,
  device_id UUID,
  device_name TEXT,
  is_primary BOOLEAN,
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, device_id)
);
